kjv: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son.
nsrv_ce: For God so loved the world that he gave his only Son.

kjv: He who helps thy weary shall under His presence, be called children of God.
nsrv_ce: He who helps thy weary shall under His presence, be called children of God.

kjv: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
nsrv_ce: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

kjv: Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God.
nsrv_ce: Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God.

kjv: He shall cover thee with his grace, and under His presence thou shalt find rest.
nsrv_ce: He will shelter you with His grace, and in His presence you will find rest.

kjv: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
nsrv_ce: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.

kjv: Let the humble rejoice, for the Lord lifts them above the storm.
nsrv_ce: Let the humble be glad, for the Lord raises them beyond the tempest.

kjv: And now abideth faith, hope, charity, these three; but the greatest of these is charity.
nsrv_ce: And now abideth faith, hope, charity, these three; but the greatest of these is charity.

kjv: The earth is the Lord's, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.
nsrv_ce: The earth is the Lord's, and the fullness thereof; the world, and those who live in it.

kjv: Those who wait upon the Lord shall be renewed as morning dew upon the fields.
nsrv_ce: Those who wait on the Lord will be refreshed like morning dew on the grass.

kjv: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you.
nsrv_ce: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you.

kjv: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
nsrv_ce: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?

kjv: He strengthens the hands of the weary, and comforts those who walk in silence.
nsrv_ce: He strengthens tired hands and comforts those who journey in silence.

kjv: The Lord is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
nsrv_ce: The Lord is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.

kjv: Surely the Lord hears the cry of the humble, and answers with compassion.
nsrv_ce: Surely the Lord listens to the cries of the humble and answers with compassion.

kjv: The Lord is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer.
nsrv_ce: The Lord is my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer.

kjv: He crowns the faithful with peace, and surrounds them with songs in the night.
nsrv_ce: He gives peace to the faithful, surrounding them with songs in the night.

kjv: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped.
nsrv_ce: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped.

kjv: He walks with the just and speaks truth into their hearts.
nsrv_ce: He walks with the righteous and places truth in their hearts.

kjv: The Lord is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.
nsrv_ce: The Lord is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.

kjv: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
nsrv_ce: For I know the plans I have for you, says the Lord, plans for your welfare and not for harm, to give you a future with hope.

kjv: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
nsrv_ce: I can do all things through him who strengthens me.

kjv: The Lord is near to the brokenhearted and saves the crushed in spirit.
nsrv_ce: The Lord is near to the brokenhearted and saves the crushed in spirit.

kjv: He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.
nsrv_ce: He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.

kjv: The Lord is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.
nsrv_ce: The Lord is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.

kjv: Cast your burden on the Lord, and he will sustain you; he will never permit the righteous to be moved.
nsrv_ce: Cast your burden on the Lord, and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

kjv: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
nsrv_ce: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

kjv: The Lord is my strength and my song, and he has become my salvation.
nsrv_ce: The Lord is my strength and my song, and he has become my salvation.
